column4: can anyone help? upgrade from 10.10 to 11.04 now just boots to an ubuntu logo and 5 red dots and doesn't go any further? virtualbox 4.0.6 on windows host
boot in recovery mode to see where the problem is
any details on how to do that? is there a key combo or something?
it asks you at boot, in the grub menu, if you cant see the grub menu press ESC
